ABOUT

hello world

My name is Martin. I am fascinated by the world wide web, AI, music, art, space and big history.

By day, I am an energy analyst at the German Aerospace Center (DLR), interested in all aspects of renewable energy systems. Check out my research here.

When time allows it, I like to make music, manipulate analogue photos with ink, and work with software.
